title: Bug 27410[SWT Examples] Arrow buttons won't resize for 10x10,50x50,100x100
description: Bug 27410[SWT Examples] Arrow buttons won't resize for 10x10,50x50,100x100 Overview Description:In the 'SWT Controls' view of the SWT Examples software,the SWT.ARROW type buttons (in the 'Button' tab) will notresize to the 10x10, 50x50, and 100x100 sizes.Steps to recreate:1.
OB: The arrow buttons will not resizeBuild 200211071448 on Solaris (also occurs on HPUX)
SR: Open the 'SWT Controls' view of the 'SWT Examples' code2. Open the 'Button' tab in the SWT Controls view3. Try the 'Preferred' and 'Horizontal Fill' sizes, note that thearrow buttons resize4. Select the SWT.ARROW style, and try sizes 10x10, 50x50, and 100x100!BUG!
